element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm calculates the hydrological distance from each cell to the closest channel

element.name: DEM
element.text: Digital Elevation Model. This should be a sink-filled DEM, since flow routing algorithms are used to calculate hydologic distances.

element.name: NETWORK
element.text: The channel network. Channel cells should have any valid value. Non-channel cells should have a no-data value

element.name: DIST
element.text:
The distance values are expressed in map units.
These distances to channel network are not eucledian distances but hydrological, taking into consideration the movement of the flow itself through the MDE.
